Name: Woodland Punch
Ingredients: 60 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 1997 by Foster Creppel. This is the signature at his Woodland Plantation, the great house on the west bank of the Mississippi that used to feature on every bottle of Southern Comfort.
Nutrition: One serving of Woodland Punch contains 208 calories
